attributes.action: caution drivers that are caught by a speed camera for the first offence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
burglars and muggers now seem to get a caution for their first offence.this is totally unfair to their victims.
to prove that speed cameras are not money making machines why not caution drivers for the first offence.unless they are involved in an accident of course.if they are caught speeding a second time then they should be punished accordingly.
